abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column examines business practices of divorce funding companies like Novitas, which largely cater to wealthy and offer loans with high interest rates so that their clients can attempt to recover marital funds after divorce; delves into way companies select clients, noting that underwriting process is extremely selective.
lead_paragraph: Divorce funding firms cater to the wealthy, offering money up front on different conditions — a payout of at least $400,000 being fundamental.

headline.main: Divorce Funding Firms Help Spouses Expecting Big Payouts
headline.print_headline: Divorce Funding Firms Help Spouses Expecting Big Payouts

snippet: Divorce funding firms cater to the wealthy, offering money up front on different conditions — a payout of at least $400,000 being fundamental.
